rdf:Description.dc:title: Collective bargaining scene labour fact book 1987
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Labour. Statistics & Information Services.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton] : Information & Statistics, Planning & Research, Alberta Labour
rdf:Description.dc:description: For <1985>, "Preliminary information" supplements published between quarterly issues containing wage settlement, strike and lockout data for a given month or months, in advance of the data being presented in (and thus superseded by) the regular issue.
Merger of: Collective bargaining scene, and: Labour fact book.--Cf. Alberta Government publications, 1988 cumulation, p. 231.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Working class
Collective bargaining
